an10.100:4.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an10.100:4.3: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ, mānaṃ—
an10.100:4.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an10.100:5.1: Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an10.100:5.3: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ, mānaṃ—
an10.100:5.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
